fields.name: Address
fields.description: Location of the backend (IP address or FQDN)

fields.name: BackendHostHeader
fields.description: The value to use as the host header sent to the backend. If blank or unspecified, this defaults to the incoming host.

fields.name: EnabledState
fields.description: Whether to enable use of this backend. Permitted values are 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

fields.name: HTTPPort
fields.description: The HTTP TCP port number. Must be between 1 and 65535.

fields.name: HTTPSPort
fields.description: The HTTPS TCP port number. Must be between 1 and 65535.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Priority to use for load balancing. Higher priorities will not be used for load balancing if any lower priority backend is healthy.

fields.name: PrivateEndpointStatus
fields.description: The Approval status for the connection to the Private Link

fields.name: PrivateLinkAlias
fields.description: The Alias of the Private Link resource. Populating this optional field indicates that this backend is 'Private'

fields.name: PrivateLinkApprovalMessage
fields.description: A custom message to be included in the approval request to connect to the Private Link

fields.name: Weight
fields.description: Weight of this endpoint for load balancing purposes.
